pages.text: This simple farm uses the property that $(item)Cactus$() breaks and drops when it touches another block. $(br2)The drops are then fed to a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#hopper)$(item)Hopper$() using $(item)Water$(). $(br2)The $(item)$(l:redstone/redstone_components#hopper)Hopper$() then transports the items to a $(l:useables/chest)$(item)Chest$().
